title: Pine Ridge man indicted for killing of young girl
content:
SIOUX FALLS, S.D. (KOTA TV) - A Pine Ridge man has been indicted by a federal grand jury for the shooting of a 12-year-old girl July 20.
James Robert Dowty, 27, is charged with second degree murder and discharge of a firearm during the commission of a crime of violence.
The young girl was shot and killed while she was walking with her friends in Pine Ridge.
Dowty appeared in federal court Nov. 22 and pleaded not guilty to the indictment.
Dowty was remanded to the custody of the U.S. Marshals Service pending trial.
